transcript:
Executive: Hello, good morning, IndiaMART se [inaudible] baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ha good morning sir, main bol raha hu [inaudible] se.
Executive: Ha sir bataiye kya help kar sakta hu main aapki?
Customer: Sir maine aapko bola tha ki maine payment kiya tha, uska refund kab tak aayega?
Executive: Sir refund ke liye aapne baat kiya tha kya pehle?
Customer: Ha baat kiya tha maine.
Executive: Kab baat kiya tha sir aapne?
Customer: Maine baat kiya tha 2 din pehle.
Executive: 2 din pehle baat kiya tha, aapka company name bata sakte hai sir?
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: [inaudible] aapka naam kya hai sir?
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Ek minute hold karega sir main check kar leta hu.
Customer: Ha.
(silence)
Executive: Sir aapne jo payment kiya tha woh kiya tha 17 tarikh ko, theek hai?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aur aapka jo refund hai woh process ho gaya hai, aapko 7 se 10 working days mein aa jayega.
Customer: Kitna din lagega?
Executive: 7 se 10 working days lagega sir.
Customer: 7 se 10 din lagega?
Executive: Ha sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur kuch help chahiye sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir, have a nice day.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about refund of payment.



Resolution:

- Informed refund has been processed.

- Refund will be received in 7-10 working days.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, working days
